abstracts.cdata!:
The Mining Credit Project has three
            components: (a) A Credit Program to help finance about 25
            development and expansion projects for about 20 mining
            enterprises from among the 40 private companies; (b) a
            National Survey of Small Mines, designed to prepare an
            inventory of small mines, select mines with the best
            potential, and provide them with technical and exploration
            assistance; and (c) a program of technical assistance to
            strengthen the Ministry of Mining and Metallurgy.
